name: manuel-js
description: A simple tool for editing files in Github, most likely as part of a CI process

scripts.test: node bin/manuel.js --org CBAInnovationLab --repo k8s-environment --branch test --file environments/test/variables.yaml --path heartsminds.image --author Manuel --email no-reply@commbanklabs.com.au --message "Deploy heartsminds 'asdfasdf'" --value asdasdf

author: dan.p.turner@gmail.com
